Text:
Learn how to draw what?  
Anyone with fingers and a pencil can draw..It's easy, hold your chosen drawing aparatus and place it on a sheet of paper...move your hand and VOILA you've drawn!

So, Generican (whatever that means), did your question get answered after you completed downloading the torrent and reading it?  Why don't you impress us with a review, huh?  Idiot.  You don't sound so clever now.  What the fuck is "VOILA"?  Dolt!  Get to the back of the line, joob.
really easy to follow great download
